table.name: document
table.remarks: Extension to the LADM used by SOLA to store electronic copies of documentation provided in support of land related dealings. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the document.

column.name: nr
column.remarks: Unique number to identify the document. Determined by the Digital Archive EJB when saving the document record.

column.name: extension
column.remarks: The file extension of the electronic file. E.g. pdf, tiff, doc, etc

column.name: mime_type
column.remarks: Mime type of the file.

column.name: body
column.remarks: The content of the electronic file.

column.name: description
column.remarks: A descriptive name to help recognizs the file such as the original file name.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the document_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: document_chunk
table.remarks: Holds temporary pieces of a document uploaded on the server. In case of large files, document can be split into smaller pieces (chunks) allowing reliable upload. After all pieces uploaded, client will instruct server to create a document and remove temporary files stored in this table.

column.name: id
column.remarks: Unique ID of the chunk

column.name: document_id
column.remarks: Document ID, which will be used to create final document object. Used to group all chunks together.

column.name: claim_id
column.remarks: Claim ID. Used to clean the table when saving claim. It will guarantee that no orphan chunks left in the table.

column.name: start_position
column.remarks: Staring position of the byte in the source/destination document

column.name: size
column.remarks: Size of the chunk in bytes.

column.name: body
column.remarks: The content of the chunk.

column.name: md5
column.remarks: Checksum of the chunk, calculated using MD5.

column.name: creation_time
column.remarks: Date and time when chuck was created.

column.name: user_name
column.remarks: User's id (name), who has loaded the chunk

table.name: Sequence: document_nr_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the document Nr field. This sequence is used by the Digital Archive EJB.
